Posts.Content: Nov 5, 2014 02:51AM PainterWoman wrote: Would like to hear from you or anybody best/favorite exercise process.  Recently moved to New England, and will probably feel "challenged" when snows or freezes come... but prefer walking.  Is it important to go for high heart rate or longer time period (I'm definitely obese and out of shape, so either will happen pretty fast....).  What about strength training at home.  Not ready to face a Gym  (64, second BC.  1st was IDC. 2nd DCIS only.  Hoping to leverage simultaneous Tamoxifen AND Metformin to loose weight.  Fearing recurrence of joint pain.  Suggestions welcome.
